member.name: T:ClassLibrary.Mvc.Authorization.CustomCookieAuthenticationEvents
member.summary:
Class to set absolute authentication cookie lifetime. After a given period user won't be able to extend it anymore and will be kicked from the app.

https://brokul.dev/authentication-cookie-lifetime-and-sliding-expiration

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelperExtensions.Gravatar(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage,System.Object)
member.summary:
Creates HTML for an img element that presents a Gravatar icon (https://en.gravatar.com/).

Original Developer: Ricardo Polo Jaramillo (https://stackoverflow.com/users/909974/ricardo-polo-jaramillo)

Original Source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/3561841/8041900
member.param: The <see cref="IHtmlHelper"/> upon which this extension method is provided.
The email address used to identify the icon.
An optional parameter that specifies the size of the square image in pixels.
An optional parameter that specifies the safety level of allowed images.
An optional parameter that controls what image is displayed for email addresses that don't have associated Gravatar icons.
An optional parameter holding additional attributes to be included on the img element.
member.returns: An HTML string of the img element that presents a Gravatar icon.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating.Default
member.summary: The default value as specified by the Gravatar service. That is, no rating value is specified with the request. At the time of authoring, the default level was .

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating.G
member.summary: Suitable for display on all websites with any audience type. This is the default.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating.Pg
member.summary: May contain rude gestures, provocatively dressed individuals, the lesser swear words, or mild violence.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating.R
member.summary: May contain such things as harsh profanity, intense violence, nudity, or hard drug use.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarRating.X
member.summary: May contain hardcore sexual imagery or extremely disturbing violence.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.Default
member.summary: The default value image. That is, the image returned when no specific default value is included with the request. At the time of authoring, this image is the Gravatar icon.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.Http404
member.summary: Do not load any image if none is associated with the email hash, instead return an HTTP 404 (File Not Found) response.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.MysteryMan
member.summary: A simple, cartoon-style silhouetted outline of a person (does not vary by email hash).

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.Identicon
member.summary: A geometric pattern based on an email hash.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.MonsterId
member.summary: A generated 'monster' with different colors, faces, etc.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.GravatarDefaultImage.Wavatar
member.summary: Generated faces with differing features and backgrounds.
